variations.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to 48% of ATK twice to the enemy in the back row. Increases Crit Chance by 5% and Crit DMG by 10% for 5s. Can stack up to 25% and 50% respectively.
Deals Physical DMG equal to 56% of ATK twice to the enemy in the back row. Increases Crit Chance by 5% and Crit DMG by 10% for 5s. Can stack up to 25% and 50% respectively.
Deals Physical DMG equal to 64% of ATK twice to the enemy in the back row. Increases Crit Chance by 5% and Crit DMG by 10% for 5s. Can stack up to 25% and 50% respectively.
Deals Physical DMG equal to 72% of ATK twice to the enemy in the back row. Increases Crit Chance by 5% and Crit DMG by 10% for 5s. Can stack up to 25% and 50% respectively.
Deals Physical DMG equal to 80% of ATK twice to the enemy in the back row. Increases Crit Chance by 5% and Crit DMG by 10% for 5s. Can stack up to 25% and 50% respectively.

Deals damage to the enemy in the back row 6 times. If the enemy is defeated, switches to the enemy in the new back row. The first attack deals Physical DMG equal to 60% of Akasha's ATK, and each subsequent attack's damage increases by 10% for every slash executed prior to it.

Deals damage to the enemy in the back row 6 times. If the enemy is defeated, switches to the enemy in the new back row. The first attack deals Physical DMG equal to 70% of Akasha's ATK, and each subsequent attack's damage increases by 10% for every slash executed prior to it.

Deals damage to the enemy in the back row 6 times. If the enemy is defeated, switches to the enemy in the new back row. The first attack deals Physical DMG equal to 80% of Akasha's ATK, and each subsequent attack's damage increases by 10% for every slash executed prior to it.

Deals damage to the enemy in the back row 6 times. If the enemy is defeated, switches to the enemy in the new back row. The first attack deals Physical DMG equal to 90% of Akasha's ATK, and each subsequent attack's damage increases by 10% for every slash executed prior to it.

Deals damage to the enemy in the back row 6 times. If the enemy is defeated, switches to the enemy in the new back row. The first attack deals Physical DMG equal to 100% of Akasha's ATK, and each subsequent attack's damage increases by 10% for every slash executed prior to it.
When unleashing Meteor Slash, there's a 10% chance to reduce the energy cost of the next Arcane: Lustre Slash to 1.
When unleashing Meteor Slash, there's a 20% chance to reduce the energy cost of the next Arcane: Lustre Slash to 1.
